TABLE.NAME: seal
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the seal activity module instances.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: Company name

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: idcoursecertify
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of certify attestated

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: Activity description.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field.

TABLE.NAME: seal_admin
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the principal entity that certify.

FIELD.NAME: enabledcreate
FIELD.COMMENT: Flag with posibility generate attestation of company

FIELD.NAME: enabledattestation
FIELD.COMMENT: Flag with value of attestation company created

FIELD.NAME: location
FIELD.COMMENT: geographic location

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: Company type: 1 university, 2 organization, 3 educational platform, 4 college, 5 school

FIELD.NAME: year
FIELD.COMMENT: fundation year

FIELD.NAME: logo
FIELD.COMMENT: url with location image logo

FIELD.NAME: email
FIELD.COMMENT: email company

FIELD.NAME: phone
FIELD.COMMENT: principal phone company

FIELD.NAME: address
FIELD.COMMENT: addrees compay

FIELD.NAME: website
FIELD.COMMENT: website company

FIELD.NAME: wallethash
FIELD.COMMENT: public address of wallet

FIELD.NAME: signaturehash
FIELD.COMMENT: signature return from wallet

FIELD.NAME: allowedwallets
FIELD.COMMENT: Wallets allowed to spend gas

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: Activity description.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field.

TABLE.NAME: seal_course_certify
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores wiht course enabled for use certify.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: program name

FIELD.NAME: enabled
FIELD.COMMENT: certify used before

FIELD.NAME: modality
FIELD.COMMENT: Modality program: 1 in person, 2 on-line, 3 hybrid

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: program description.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field.

TABLE.NAME: seal_course_political
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the political certify activity module instances.

FIELD.NAME: idcoursecertify
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of certify attestated

FIELD.NAME: typepolitical
FIELD.COMMENT: type political: 1,completly course. 2,quiz. 3,other certify 4,manual for teacher

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: coursevalue
FIELD.COMMENT: value optional

FIELD.NAME: quiz
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the quiz this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: quizvalue
FIELD.COMMENT: minimal value of quiz.

FIELD.NAME: manualteacher
FIELD.COMMENT: value manual teacher

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: Activity description.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field.

TABLE.NAME: seal_user
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the user activity module instances.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: Activity description.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field.
